text.0: agni inflamed hath sent to heaven his lustre he shines forth widely turning unto morning.
text.1: eastward the ladle goes that brings all blessing praising the godswith homage and oblation.
text.2: enkindled thou art king of the immortal world him who brings offerings thou attendest for his weal.
text.3: he whom thou urgest on makes all possessions his he sets before thee agni gifts that guests may claim.
text.4: show thyself strong for mighty bliss o agni most excellent be thine effulgent splendours.
text.5: make easy to maintain our household lordship and overcome the might of those who hate us.
text.6: thy glory agni i adore kindled exalted in thy strength.
text.7: a steer of brilliant splendour thou art lighted well at sacred rites.
text.8: agni invoked and kindled serve the gods thou skilled in sacrifice.
text.9: for thou art bearer of our gifts.
text.10: invoke and worship agni while the sacrificial rite proceeds.
